jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Conducting code reviews and ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.Troubleshooting and debugging issues to optimize application performance.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in software development

jobs.title: Web Developer
jobs.description: Developing and maintaining both the front-end and back-end of web applications.Collaborating with the design and product teams to implement user-friendly interfaces.
requirements: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Designing and developing scalable and high-performance web applications. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define and implement features.
